item.title: A page to test out line breaks
item.description: A page to test out line breaks This page will is to test something: Line breaks. Is there a blank line above here?âŸ° At first, NO (?!?) There certainly should be a line break because each of these lines is sitting inside a <p> tag.

item.title: A sample page of images and captions
item.description: A sample page of images and captions All of these images are 800px on the long edge. It seems I just can’t pass up the opportunity to take a picture of a curved trail - in this case with a pond and meadow beyond.

item.title: Grant's Testing Captions Page
item.description: Grant’s New Page. [!NOTE ] Centering the image and caption together Okay I’ve got the LANDSCAPE pictures centering with the caption centering with them. But damn, now I need to center or constrain the portrait images.

item.title: GSW's version of an original page
item.description: GSW’s version of an original page Editing Quartz runs on top of Hugo so all notes are written in Markdown. Folder Structure Here’s a rough overview of what’s what. All content in your garden can found in the /content folder.

item.title: Testing out footnotes
item.description: Testing out footnotes Here’s the syntax for footnotes again: Nullam tristique diam purus, at vestibulum nisi pharetra sed.1 Quisque et turpis tellus. Integer arcu nulla, venenatis id elit non, ornare euismod tellus.
